descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/8130/coverkhajiitscover.jpg[/img][/center]


[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/1444/catsrig.jpg[/img] [color=Gray][size=6]Description:[/size][/color]
And again, hi everyone! I finally got to the description (hate to do it), for those who 
still do not understand that in front of him - it\'s retextur pack and at this time retextur 
for all khajiits in the game.


[list][b]Includes:[/b]
[*]high res textures (2048x2048), also available lite version (1024x1024) 
[*]improved msn/s files
[/list]

At your discretion I made 2 type* of installation:
*male version (if you suddenly want to change only men)
*female version (if you suddenly want to change only women)


[youtube]RnlZcUqmMLo[/youtube]
If interested you can watch the video by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3166292]Arsenalrobert[/url])) 


[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/1444/catsrig.jpg[/img][color=Gray][size=6]Installation:[/size][/color][list]
[*]Extract the files
[*]Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder (Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim)
[*]Enjoy (or maybe not)))
[/list]


[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/1444/catsrig.jpg[/img] [color=Gray][size=6]Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
Remove the following folder:
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\khajiitmale
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\khajiitfemale



[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/1444/catsrig.jpg[/img] [color=Gray][size=6]Compatibility:[/size][/color]
I used this mod with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE bodies[/url] and [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]covereyes[/url], but you can safely use other)). So far 
the bugs has not been noticed.



[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/1444/catsrig.jpg[/img] [color=Gray][size=6]Credits:[/size][/color]
Please ask me before using a mod for their own purposes.

Much thanks to Bethesda!

I hope you like my mod. Upload yuor pictures, will be glad to see them))
[color=Steelblue][size=3]...Thanks for your attention, comments and supporting!..[/size][/color][right][img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/5237/cats2hd.jpg[/img][/right]
author: mrLenski
